C_Cpp.clang_format_fallbackStyle: { BasedOnStyle: LLVM, UseTab: Never, IndentWidth: 4, TabWidth: 4, BreakBeforeBraces: Stroustrup, AllowShortIfStatementsOnASingleLine: true, AllowShortBlocksOnASingleLine: true, IndentCaseLabels: false, ColumnLimit: 0, AccessModifierOffset: -2, NamespaceIndentation: None, FixNamespaceComments: false }
